data.title: President Harry S. Truman Rear platform remarks in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: President Harry S. Truman rear platform remarks in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. This recording includes reporter commentary, the introduction of President Truman, and reporter commentary after the speech. E. Dan Laibensperger.

Description

President Harry S. Truman rear platform remarks in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. This recording includes reporter commentary, the introduction of President Truman, and reporter commentary after the speech. E. Dan Laibensperger.
